What's The Process?

Consultation

Meeting you face to face is important to us, so we begin with a free 20 minute, no obligaton consultation, helping us to give you a more tailored experience when it comes to your showreel. Whether it's questions to do with scripts, locations or even where to begin, we believe its vital that we are here for you from the very start. It's during this meeting that we establish your ideas and objectives and formulate a plan to deliver the best showreel for you. Should you decide to proceed, all we ask is that you put down a deposit of Â£50.00 to save the shoot date with us.

Shoot Day

Lights, Camera and Action. In the run up to the shoot, we provide you with a schedule, which allows us plenty of time to capture your finest moments in front of the camera. On the day itself, we cater for your every need providing the kit, direction and know how to allow you to focus on your performance, and nothing else. We are here to guide and assist you throughout your shoot, allowing you that extra take or shot review to ensure that you're happy before we go into the cutting room.

Editing

With the footage from the shoot day, we will work on everything from colour correction to audio sync, creating scenes which truly make your mark. Once we have created a first edit of your showreel, we will send you a copy and a review form for any changes you want to make before we finalise it. On delivery you will receive a master copy alongside an upload link to the Blotched Ink Vimeo account where your showreel can be viewed and shared. If you already have existing material that you want to incorporate into your new showreel, please don't hesitate to ask.
